  method={"put"}

Mettre à jour les préférences de notifications

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"generalEnabled":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Activer/désactiver les notifications générales"},"defaultTime":{"type":"string","example":"08:00:00","description":"Heure par défaut des notifications (HH:MM:SS)"},"reminders":{"description":"Rappels de notifications à mettre à jour","example":[{"type":"PERIOD_START","enabled":true,"time":"08:00:00"}],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"UpdateNotificationPreferencesDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Préférences de notifications mises à jour avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","example":"Paramètres mis à jour avec succès","description":"Message de confirmation"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"unitPreference":{"type":"string","example":"METRIC"},"notificationEnabled":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"notificationTime":{"type":"string","example":"08:00:00"}}},"updatedReminders":{"type":"number","example":2,"description":"Nombre de rappels mis à jour"},"updatedObjectives":{"type":"number","example":1,"description":"Nombre d'objectifs mis à jour"},"updatedFeatureFlags":{"type":"number","example":3,"description":"Nombre de feature flags mis à jour"}},"required":["message","settings","updatedReminders","updatedObjectives","updatedFeatureFlags"],"title":"UpdateSettingsResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données invalides ou erreur de validation"}}}
 id="auth-controller-update-notification-preferences-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
